page.title: 16RELIGION ON RAASAY
page.content: THERE ARE TWO CHURCHES ON RAASAY .THE FREE PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH OF SCOTLAND AND THE FREE CHURCH OF SCOTLAND.THE MAJORITY OF THE POPULATION, APPROXIMATELY 100,ARE MEMBERS IN THE FREE PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH.THE FREE CHURCH HAS APPROXIMATLY 25-30 MEMBERS.THE REMAINDER OF THE POPULATION ARE INCOMERS TO RAASAY.THE DOCTRINE OF BOTH CHURCHES IS THE BIBLE AND WORSHIP IS BIBLE PREACHING.THE PRACTICE OF THE CHURCHES IS TO KEEP THE SABBATH DAY AND GO TO CHURCH.SO NOTHING IS OPEN AND THERE ARE NO FERRIESON A SUNDAY.THERE WAS A VACANCY FOR A MINISTER FOR 7 YEARS.IN THE FREE PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH OF SCOTLAND UNTIL THE REV.DR.JAMES TALLACH CAME IN 1984.THE FREE CHURCH HAS NO PERMENANT MINISTER BUT EVERY FEW WEEKS A SUPPLY MINISTER OR STUDENT MINISTER COMES TO PREACH.
